text:
Steak & Potatoes (price varies) (gf)

Chef's choice cut, herbed butter, roasted brussels, beef fat potatoes, chimichurri rojo, alioli
Fazzoletti 26

Smoked salmon, goat cheese, pink peppercorn, summer peas, lemon, micro broccoli, hazelnuts
Pork Rice Bowl 24 (gf)

Porchetta, n'duja fried rice, black garlic bbq, pork rind, watercress, poached egg, scallion whites
Ricotta Gnocchi 23 (veg)

Crème fraîche, spinach, artichoke, pecorino, fried garbanzo
Chicken Confit Salad 21 (gf)

Grilled romaine heart, jalapeño caesar, radish, crisp prosciutto, manchego, dill
Steamed Mussels 19

Black bean & tomato broth, white wine, chili crunch, fried onions & garlic, parsley, grilled baguette
Cauliflower Caponata 19 (veg, gf)

Smoked eggplant, sundried tomato, pea shoots, capers, dried olive, whipped tahini, walnuts, parm, lemon
Handhelds

All handhelds come with your choice of fries or garden salad.
Substitute caesar salad +3, poutine +4, kimchi fries (kimchi & mayo only) +4, duck poutine +7
Sov Burger 21

8oz ground chuck patty, american cheddar, special sauce, bacon jam, pickle, arugula, milk bun
Chorizo Sando 19

House-made chorizo, chimichurri rojo, alioli, fried onion, smoked gouda, arugula, grilled baguette
Roasted Mushroom Sando 19 (veg)

Rosemary mayo, mozzarella, roasted red peppers, spinach, caramelized onions, balsamic glaze, milk bun
Please note:

(gf) indicates gluten-free options.
Prices are not included for the Steak & Potatoes.

Fried Cauliflower (veg): 14
Lemon pepper, house ranch, chives
Goat Cheese Churros (veg): 16
Mango chutney, chili-chive mayo
Sov Empanadas (veg): 18
Caramelized onion, jalapeño, cheese curd, house ranch
Fried Chicken: 19
Chipotle mayo, honey, pickle slaw, peanuts, chives
Sides:

Poutine: 8/14
Cheese curds, beef gravy
Vegetarian Poutine: 8/14
Cheese curds, miso gravy, green onions
Kimchi Fries Deluxe (gf): 18
Pork belly, brussels sprouts, hondashi mayo, chives
Duck Poutine: 21
Duck confit, caramelized onions, cheese curds, beef gravy
Caesar Salad: 8/14
House dressing, croutons, bacon, asiago
Nachos (veg/gf): 19
Cheddar cheese, jack cheese, tomato, red pepper, black olive, roasted corn, jalapeño, green onion
Add chorizo (gf): 3.5
Chicken Wings (gf): 18/34

Dry: Salt & pepper, Cajun, roasted garlic & red pepper, lemon pepper, Korean BBQ rub
Sauced: Chipotle apple BBQ, Buffalo chili, spicy garlic parm
Please Note:

(veg) indicates vegetarian options
(gf) indicates gluten-free options

All pizzas come with a nut-free pesto crust, tomato sauce & mozzarella base.

Sov Deluxe: 23

Pepperoni, banana pepper, crimini mushroom, roasted red pepper
Hawaiian: 23

Spiced ham, pineapple, chili honey
Pancetta & Goat Cheese: 23

Caramelized onion, basil
Prosciutto & Fig: 23

Gorgonzola dolce, balsamic glaze
Greek: 23

Olive tapenade, spinach, feta, sun-dried tomato, red pepper, red onion
Spicy Italian: 23

Calabrese salami, crimini mushroom, pepperoncini, asiago, la bomba
Build Your Own Pizza: 13

Tomato sauce, mozzarella, nut-free pesto crust
Additional Toppings: 3

Cheese: Nacho cheese, goat cheese, gorgonzola, parm, asiago, feta, vegan cheddar ($3.50)
Meat: Pancetta, prosciutto, chorizo ($3.50), duck confit ($5), pepperoni, calabrese salami, chicken confit ($3.50), spiced ham, banana pepper, pepperoni, olive, pineapple, mushroom, roasted corn, black olive, caramelized onion, red onion ($3.50), arugula ($4), spinach, la bomba, sun-dried tomato, olive tapenade ($3.50), kimchi ($4)
Finishers: Green onion, basil, chili honey, balsamic glaze, chili oil ($1.50)

BRUNCH MENU

Fried Chicken & Waffles 18
maple bourbon or chili honey, brown sugar butter

Full Sov 13.5
2 sunny eggs, 4 slices of bacon, 1 house made sausage, baked beans, toast

Sov Benny 14
poached eggs, maple glazed pork belly, english muffin, brown butter & gochujang hollandaise

Hangover 16.5
fried eggs, smoked 'nduja jam, sweet potato purée, kimchi, chives, parm, toast

Brekky Poutine 17.5
home fries, fried pork belly & brussels sprouts, cheese curds, miso gravy, sunny egg, scallions

Lit Poached Eggs 15
bomba purgatorio sauce, fried onions, garlic labneh, fresh basil, chili crunch, toast

Chèvre Frite Salad 14
pickled grape, fig, apple, arugula, almond, vin cotto

Double Chocolate Mochi Waffle 7
hot fudge, whipped cream, kahlua cherry compote

SIDES

home fries w/ house ketchup 4
kimchi home fries w/ hondashi mayo 5.5
bacon 4
sausage 4
toast 2
egg 3
hollandaise 2.5

DRINKS

Coffee 2.5
Tea 2.5
Milk 3
Juice 3

Menu developed by Chef Riley Marsh.
name: Sovereign Room, The
